name: Unknown Way Home
description:
My first project ,play the game and enjoy for free ...it toke me some time but i managed to finish !

The project is a third person shooter with all kind of situation ,enemys ,exploring, military bases etc ... You might find some bugs ,but sience is my first project it occurs ,leave comment ,suggestions ,anything will be much apreciated and help me get better!

Please play ,enjoy and let a review !

Thank you!
